rows.name: Ask Giotto if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.name: Ask Giotto if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Giotto about the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Giotto if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.name:
Ask Giotto for his opinions on
your battle with the Zu Pharg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Giotto about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Giotto about the battle for the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Giotto if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_SEL0131
rows.name: Ask Giotto about strength training.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_SEL0141
rows.name: Ask Giotto about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_SEL0161
rows.name: Ask Giotto if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Giotto about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0001
rows.name:
You that new [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ] everyone's talking about?
Pffft! You're a scrawny one, ain't ya?
Sure wouldn't want you watching my back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0002
rows.name:
Do you even lift? You gotta start training those abs,
pecs, and delts, [ST:gender p1=bro p2=babe ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0003
rows.name:
Leave the city looking like that, and you'll be in some
indigen's belly before the gate clangs shut behind you.
Not that you'd make much of a meal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you're planning on doing any serious fighting,
get your glutes down to Armory Alley and buy
yourself some proper gear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Huh? What about me? [ST:gender p1=Dude p2=Babe ], when you're ripped like
I am, gear don't make one bit of difference.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0008
rows.name:
What do you think? Pretty impressive, right?
Go on, you can touch 'em. Wanna see me flex?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0013
rows.name:
Did you know you could take the elevator on Division
Drive down to the lower level of the administrative
district? That's where the hangars are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0014
rows.name:
A bunch of punks usually hang out in the shadows
down there. They like to pick fights with new BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'm sure they'd love to have a go at you,
so watch your back, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0031
rows.name:
I saw some footage of the Prone on FrontierNav.
Looks like they work out pretty regularly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0032
rows.name:
You seriously mix it up with those guys?
How'd it go? Are they as tough as they look?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0033
rows.name:
Haw haw haw. Oh yeah, I believe it.
They look like some pretty tough customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0034
rows.name:
But if they were to come after me and my crew,
we'd mop the floor with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0037
rows.name:
These chiseled arms would make 'em regret the day
they decided to go up against the might of BLADE.
We're talking two tickets to the guns show, boom![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0040
rows.name:
So I was walking through that block at the back of
Division Drive. You know, the one that's still under
construction?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0041
rows.name:
And from behind a crane in the back,
I heard someone shouting "I WILL become a BLADE!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0042
rows.name:
Well, I got kinda curious and decided to take a look.
Turns out it was some mechanic chick doing all
the shouting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0043
rows.name:
She just stood there staring at the outer walls with this
really intense look on her face. Weird, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0052
rows.name: Hear you lost your left hand in a Ganglion attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0053
rows.name:
That's the sort of thing that happens when you don't
commit to a rigorous strength-training regimen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0054
rows.name:
...What? You're asking me if strength-training even has
an effect on the artificial muscles of a mimeosome?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0055
rows.name:
Well, sure, maybe it doesn't actually make them any
more PHYSICALLY powerful, but you FEEL like you're
getting stronger. Ain't that enough?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0056
rows.name:
Once you've honed your spirit and boosted your
willpower with a good training regimen, you won't
ever fear the Ganglion again[ST:gender p1=, dude! p2=! ][ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0059
rows.name:
There's an old warehouse at the edge of the industrial
district that no one uses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0060
rows.name:
But it sounds like a bunch of tough-looking xenoforms
have taken over the place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0061
rows.name:
Are those Ma-non? I thought they were all a bunch of
little shrimps, but maybe they've got a few big guys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0070
rows.name:
Hey! I heard you were the one who drove away that
Ryyz bird and her bulky friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0071
rows.name:
Man, when you first showed up here, I thought you
were just another scrawny nobody.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0072
rows.name:
Never thought you'd toughen up enough to beat
monsters like them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0073
rows.name:
With strength like that, I'm proud to have you working
with me to guard this city and chase down the Lifehold![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0076
rows.name:
I heard that big guy and the chick who led the attack
on New LA have been spotted in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0077
rows.name:
Sounds like BLADE command might be putting together
a pursuit team to go after them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0078
rows.name:
If you aren't on some urgent mission already, maybe
you should go listen to what people are saying out in
front of BLADE HQ.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0079
rows.name:
I can't imagine anyone who's a better fit for the job
than the [ST:gender p1=dude p2=gal ] who drove 'em off in the first place.
I'm sure HQ would love to have you on board![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0088
rows.name:
I watched your fight with that Zu Pharg thing over
FrontierNav. Impressive work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0089
rows.name:
That thing was huge, but you were batting it around
like a cat with a ball of twine. Man, was I cheering
when you sent it crashing down upon Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0090
rows.name:
It REALLY got everyone's blood pumping to watch you
kick some serious Ganglion glutes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0091
rows.name:
That's the spirit, [ST:gender p1=dude p2=babe ]! It's time we went on offense
and brought that kind of glute-kicking right to the
Ganglion's doorstep![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0094
rows.name:
So I rode the elevator down to the hangars to check on
my Skell earlier, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0095
rows.name:
But then this guy—apparently some sort of BLADE—
came up and wrapped his arms around me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0096
rows.name:
I thought he was gonna choke me or something,
but instead he called me "Muscles" and asked me to
help him out with a recovery mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0097
rows.name:
I dunno, man. Seems like a pretty weird way to go
about asking for help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0098
rows.name:
Anyway, maybe keep an eye out if you have any
business down there. ...Unless you like surprise hugs
from strangers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0106
rows.name:
So the decisive battle is finally here, huh?
It's weird, man...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0107
rows.name:
In some ways, it feels like it was only yesterday that
those bastards wrecked the Earth and sent us fleeing.
But in another way, it feels like forever ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0108
rows.name:
You know I'll be right behind you, supporting you
with everything I got. You just gotta bring home one
last victory for us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0109
rows.name:
And I mean that[ST:gender p1=, dude. p2=. ] You're the ace of the whole
BLADE deck, and everyone knows it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0110
rows.name: Now get out there and finish the job![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0113
rows.name:
Did you know that there's a Mediator assigned to the
Nopon Caravan in Oblivia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0114
rows.name:
Man, that's a tough region, and he's all by himself.
Even worse, I hear the Nopon are forcing him to do
all sorts of ridiculous jobs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0115
rows.name:
You get out to that place from time to time, yeah?
Next time you're in the neighborhood, how about
you swing by and talk to the poor guy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0119
rows.name:
I'm sure he'd be thrilled to have a human to talk to
for once![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0120
rows.name:
You know Kent? That puny little mimeosome tech?
He claims that none of my strength-training is doing
a damn thing to build muscles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0121
rows.name:
He told me the only muscle I got that needs training
is my brain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0122
rows.name:
I can't wait till we get our real bodies back.
Then I'll give y'all a lesson in bodybuilding that
no one will be able to laugh off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0123
rows.name:
Abs, pecs, and delts, baby! I'll work your midsections
so hard you'll be too sore to eat for days.
But goddamn will I make you look great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0124
rows.name:
And when Kent gets a load of my six-pack,
we'll see who's mocking who![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0125
rows.name:
There sure are a lot of xenoforms with great muscle
tone. I mean, just look how ripped the Wrothians and
Prone are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0126
rows.name:
One of these days, I'd like to give 'em both a good
chest-bump and see whose pecs comes out on top.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0127
rows.name:
You know, I don't think we have a place where we
can get together and peacefully test our strength
against each other like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0128
rows.name:
Hell, you've gotten pretty tough yourself!
I sure wouldn't mind putting your muscles to the test.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0129
rows.name:
I heard the Wrothians are opening a combat arena
near the Outfitters test hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0130
rows.name: If you got a little time off, why not come try it out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0131
rows.name:
You should give those Wrothians a look at the muscles
that knocked the Ganglion's finest right the hell out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0132
rows.name:
Hey! I hear you entered the Wrothian Battle Gauntlet
and completely dominated the thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0133
rows.name: You mind if I squeeze the best muscles in the universe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0134
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0135
rows.name:
Ooooooh yeaaaaaah! Those are killer, bro!
I can feel the expansion of the universe pulsating
through your mighty biceps![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0136
rows.name:
I gotta up my training game so I can build galaxy-class
muscles like yours![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0137
rows.name:
Hey! I hear you entered the Wrothian Battle Gauntlet
and completely dominated the thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0138
rows.name:
It's incredible that you were able to beat those
Wrothians, considering their superhuman pecs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0139
rows.name:
They must lift every day to get physiques like that.
Just training, training, and more training.
Probably hit the kettlebells, too. Talk about a WOD![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0140
rows.name:
...You know, I'm always kind of uncomfortable around
the ladies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0141
rows.name:
But with a super ripped lady like you, I feel like I can
talk normally! We'll have to get together and trade
workout secrets one of these days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0116
rows.name:
There's only one way to heal the pain of being
betrayed by someone you care about, and that's
a rigorous lifting session.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0117
rows.name:
Our muscles won't ever let us down. So let's reward
our mimeo-muscles by working them till we puke![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011701_MSG0118
rows.name: Awww yeah! I can't WAIT to be sore tomorrow![ST:wait ]
